g.style: opacity: 1; fill: rgb(0, 0, 0); stroke: none; stroke-width: 1px; text-anchor: start; dominant-baseline: auto; stroke-linecap: butt; font-family: Times; font-size: 16px; font-style: normal;

text.style: opacity: 1; fill: rgb(0, 0, 0); stroke: rgb(0, 0, 0); stroke-width: 0px; text-anchor: start; dominant-baseline: middle; stroke-linecap: butt; font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 17px; font-style: normal;

g.text: Pentatonic blues scale pattern 2: melody side
